title: Amy Schneider Wins the Most Consecutive ‘Jeopardy!’ Games of Any Female Contestant
description: After breaking the record this week, Ms. Schneider, an engineering manager from California, won another game, stretching her total to 22 in a row.
dc:creator: Maria Cramer and Jenny Gross
media:description: Amy Schneider competing on the game show “Jeopardy!” that aired on Dec. 29.
